fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select an owner during the day if you don't have one.
- Run away from your owner at night. This will process at the end of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The player you select as your owner will receive a message telling them a Dog has chosen them as their owner at the beginning of the following night. You and your owner will be given a private chat that stays open as long as that player is still your owner.
- Your owner must feed you every night. If your owner does not choose to feed you at night, you will run away and select a new owner the next day. Feeding does not count as a night ability. You cannot select a previous owner as your new owner.
- If anyone attempts to attack your owner, your owner gains Powerful Defense, and you will cause the attacker to start bleeding. If they are not healed the following night, the attacker will die.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- Your owner may choose to feed you treats alongside feeding you normally. If they do this, you will protect yourself from attackers the same way as you protect your owner for the night. You may only be fed treats twice across all of your owners. Your owner will be notified how many treats are left when they become your owner.
- If an attacker targets you, you and your owner will be dealt the attack applied to you unless you were fed treats that night.
- You may not be your own owner you nincompoop.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game with an owner.
